schedules.title: Benediction
schedules.desc: Soldier Siegfried Sassoon returns from World War I and becomes a vocal critic of the government's continuation of the war. Adored by the stars of London's literary world, Sassoon's experiences inspire him to write poetry about the horrors of battle.

schedules.title: Panorama
schedules.desc:
Trump and the Tech Titans
Silicon Valley's original disruptors didn't just change technology, they rewired politics. Panorama investigates the 'PayPal Mafia' and their influence on Donald Trump's rise to the White House.

schedules.title: Panorama
schedules.desc:
The Fall of Prince Andrew
Andrew Mountbatten Windsor has been stripped of his royal titles and is being evicted from the rent-free mansion he calls home. His disgrace follows a scandal that's been 25 years in the making.

schedules.title: Riot Women
schedules.desc: S1 E4 Six weeks on and it's the talent contest! As the Riot Women prepare for their debut, Tom wrestles with his new past. Kitty delivers a nose-busting punch.

schedules.title: This Is BBC TWO
schedules.desc: A preview of upcoming programmes from BBC Two.

schedules.title: Mojo Swoptops
schedules.desc:
S1 E37 The Swoppiton Duck
Mojo and Bo need Ted's help to pull a wobbly duck statue up Swoppiton Hill. But does Ted know the best way? And will there be anything left of the duck when they get there?

schedules.title: Big Lizard
schedules.desc:
S1 E5 Dad's Discovery
Whilst searching for new discoveries, a rockfall traps Dad, Cosima and Big Lizard in a cave. Just when all is lost, Dad finally discovers a new species.

schedules.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
schedules.desc:
S1 E5 Super Happy Bake-Off
An angry Swampclops follows the heroes back from their quest for a giant raspberry, so Hoofius must abandon his chances of winning the bake-off.

schedules.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
schedules.desc:
S4 E9 For Real
The Lemmings find a strange card game representing the elements, and the idea is to pretend that the ground is on fire or made of ice.

schedules.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
schedules.desc:
S4 E10 Cocoa Tree Spread
The Lemmings discover an interesting cocoa tree with chocolate spread sap. Reduced to eating canned Brussels sprouts, the only remaining food in the cabin, Grizzy is baffled when he sees the Lemmings parading past.

schedules.title: Pokémon Horizons: The Series
schedules.desc:
S2 E6 The Flower Tower
A new adventure begins as Liko receives her first partner Pokémon, Sprigatito!

schedules.title: Bro's in Control
schedules.desc:
S3 E6 Paws and Pans
Adam and Joe are joined by their dogs to help them in the kitchen. The fluffy sous chefs get to work on baking Callum's dog Bailey a doggy treat.

schedules.title: Gladiators: Epic Pranks
schedules.desc:
S1 E6 Cyclone!
Nitro and Fury prank Cyclone, who thinks she is filming an animal-theme exercise video dressed as a turtle. The other Gladiators have fun pranking the audience at Sheffield Arena.

schedules.title: Blue Peter
schedules.desc:
Canadian Adventure featuring Walking with Dinosaurs Competition
The winner of the Blue Peter Walking with Dinosaurs Competition is revealed!

schedules.title: Newsround
schedules.desc: News magazine keeping young viewers up to date with the latest stories and events happening at home and abroad.

schedules.title: Deadly Predators
schedules.desc:
S1 E3 Power
Steve goes in search of some of the most powerful predators on the planet. At historic Warwick Castle, meet the stellar sea eagle, world's heaviest eagle. Eagle Nikita is an expert at lifting fish up to one third of her body weight out of the ocean to eat. To demonstrate this ability up close, Steve has a time slice rig.

schedules.title: The Bishop's Wife
schedules.desc: Henry has spent so long raising money for a new cathedral that he's completely forgotten about his poor wife Julia. Enter Dudley, an angel who's about to make them both happy.

schedules.title: Gardeners' World
schedules.desc: E30 Frances Tophill is back at Damson Farm, lending a hand with autumn jobs in the garden. She learns of a recipe for making an architectural compost cake, plants a container with evergreens and spring bulbs, and takes hard wood cuttings from a tree.

schedules.title: Rick Stein's Cornwall
schedules.desc: S3 E10 Rick drops in on the fishing port of Boscastle and finds a restaurant in a building which once housed rockets used to fire safety ropes out to sinking ships. A trip to Cornwall's only dedicated organic mushroom farm inspires him to cook a stir fry.

schedules.title: Mary at 90: A Lifetime of Cooking
schedules.desc: S1 E2 Sports broadcaster Gabby Logan joins Dame Mary in the kitchen to cook some of her standout time-saving recipes. Gabby asks Mary to share her own tales of being a working mum 50 years ago, the early days when Mary was one of the first TV cooks.

schedules.title: Alison Hammond's Florida Unpacked
schedules.desc: S1 E4 Alison and Aidan hop on an affordable, high-speed train heading to Fort Lauderdale. With bargain hunting at the top of Alison's `to do' list, a thrifting pro shows them how to snag the best second-hand finds.

schedules.title: The Robe
schedules.desc: A Roman centurion in charge of the crucifixion of Christ is profoundly affected by the experience and converts to Christianity.

schedules.title: The Desert Rats
schedules.desc: English captain MacRoberts, a British officer in charge of Australia's 9th Division, defends a strategic outpost against Rommel and his henchmen. Despite capture, he manages to escape and lead his men to safety.

schedules.title: Celebrity Race Across the World
schedules.desc: S3 E1 Four familiar faces - Roman Kemp, Dylan Llewellyn, Anita Rani and Molly Rainford - set off with a loved one on an epic 5,900km race through Central America. The race begins on Isla Mujeres, the easternmost point of Mexico.

schedules.title: Darkest Hour
schedules.desc: With the German Army now just across the Channel, newly-appointed Prime Minister Winston Churchill must decide between negotiating a peace treaty with Hitler or standing firm. With the King, the public and his own political party all questioning his wisdom, the hard-drinking Churchill has to survive his own darkest hour and rally the country behind him.

schedules.title: BBC Proms  ᴺᵉʷ
schedules.desc:
JADE at the Proms: A Homecoming
The pop powerhouse performs with a full orchestra at the Glasshouse in Gateshead with reimagined tracks from her debut album.

schedules.title: Girl Bands Forever  ᴺᵉʷ
schedules.desc: S1 E3 As talent show winners Little Mix contend with social media, cool kids Sugababes face changing line-ups. And as some familiar faces make a comeback, what is the future for girl bands?

schedules.title: The Spice Girls at the BBC
schedules.desc: To mark 25 years since Geri, Emma, Victoria and the Mels first exploded onto the world stage, take a trip into the music archives to uncover the performances that every Spice Girls devotee really, really wants to see again.

schedules.title: Glastonbury  ᴺᵉʷ
schedules.desc:
Sugababes
They shut down Avalon in 2023, now the OG line up come back even stronger on West Holts.

schedules.title: Top of the Pops
schedules.desc:
Eternal Special
Performance by Eternal on Top of the Pops, first broadcast 1998.
